sentences.en: Can you see the words on the blackboard clearly?
sentences.cn: 黑板上的字你看得真 吗 ?

sentences.en: Go to the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 到黑板那去。

sentences.en: He chalked out a design on the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 他用粉笔在黑板上勾划出一个图样。

sentences.en: He wrote the title on the blackboard, then copied out the text sentence by sentence.
sentences.cn: 他将题目写在黑板上，然后逐句抄下课文。

sentences.en: How many blackboard are there in your classroom?
sentences.cn: 有多少张黑板在你的教室里？

sentences.en: I can't bear the sound of chalk scraping on a blackboard.
sentences.cn: 我受不了粉笔在黑板上摩擦时发出的刺耳声音.

sentences.en: I turned around and wrote the title on the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 我转过身，在黑板上写下了题目。

sentences.en: I wrote the date at the far left of the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 我把日期写在黑板的最左边。

sentences.en: Please copy down all the words on the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 请把黑板上的字都抄下来.

sentences.en: She got angry and wiped out her name on the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 她生气了,于是就把黑板上她的名字擦掉了.

sentences.en: She marked a square on the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 她在黑板上画了个正方形。

sentences.en: She rubbed the exercises off the blackboard after class.
sentences.cn: 下课后她把习题从黑板上擦掉。

sentences.en: Teachers usually write on the blackboard with chalk.
sentences.cn: 教师通常用粉笔在黑板上书写。

sentences.en: The chalk jarred against the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 粉笔在黑板上发出吱吱声.

sentences.en: The man standing before the blackboard is our English teacher.
sentences.cn: 站在黑板前面的那个人是我们的英语老师.

sentences.en: The teacher is cleaning the blackboard with a board rubber.
sentences.cn: 老师正在用黑板擦擦黑板.

sentences.en: The teacher knocked on the blackboard to catch our attention.
sentences.cn: 老师敲了敲黑板以引起我们的注意。

sentences.en: The teacher wiped the misspelling from the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 老师把黑板上拼错的字擦了.

sentences.en: There was a blackboard with seven names chalked on it.
sentences.cn: 黑板上用粉笔写着7个人名。

sentences.en: They realigned the desks so that they face the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 他们将书桌重新排好使其面向黑板。

sentences.en: to write on the blackboard
sentences.cn: 在黑板上写字

sentences.en: With a stick of chalk he wrote her order on a blackboard.
sentences.cn: 他用一截粉笔将她的指示写在黑板上。

sentences.en: You must position yourself where you can see the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 你必须坐在能看见黑板的地方.

trans.tran_en: a board with a dark smooth surface, used in schools for writing on with  chalk
